metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2980 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Tools/gdomap.c in gdomap in GNUstep Base 1.24.6 and earlier, when run in daemon mode, does not properly handle the file descriptor for the logger, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (abort) via an invalid request.

criterions.comment: gnustep-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
